name: Like Like EX
author: Alucard648
description: Just a variant of LikeLike that can eat any counter. Also displays message when it succefully eats item, like magic shield.
setup: Step speed, Random Rate, Homing Facor andHunger Rate used.Attribute 1:Counter reference to eatAttribute 2:counter reduction amount.Attribute 3:delay between counter reductions. in framesAttribute 4:Item to eat.Attribute 5::Delay between engulfing Link and devouring item, in frames.Attribute 6:String to display, when enemy eats item.Attribute 11: -1Attribute 12: script slot
